item.title: Cardsmash Podcast - Episode 5
item.itunes:author: Cardotrade Podcaster
item.dc:creator: Cardotrade
item.description: Cyberknight8610, WildHarpie, and YakomoFujikawa bring the you Card Smash Podcast. We will have the latest Yu-Gi-Og! TCG News, Pokemon TCG News, Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG Tournament Reports/ Tips, and some random talking. Be sure to listen and hang out with the Card Smash crew!
item.itunes:keywords: cardsmash, tcg news, yugioh, pokemon, mtg, trade cards, cyberknight, cardotrade, trade cards, trading cards

item.title: CardSmash Podcast - Episode 6
item.itunes:author: Cardotrade Podcaster
item.dc:creator: Cardotrade
item.description:
Cyberknight8610, WildHarpie, and YakomoFujikawa bring the you Card Smash Podcast. We will have the latest Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG News, Pokemon TCG News, Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG Tournament Reports/ Tips, and some random talking. Be sure to listen and hang out with the Card Smash crew!!!
Also be sure to send your questions to podcast@cardotrade.com to have it read and answered on the show!!!
item.itunes:keywords: cardsmash, tcg news, yugioh, pokemon, mtg, trade cards, cyberknight, cardotrade, trade cards, trading cards
